%dw 2.0
type fullfillmentRS = {| request: {| pos: {| aaa: {| country: String, number: String |}, company: String, lniata: String, sine: String, pseudoCityCode: String, channel: String, localDateTime: String, firstName: String, lastName: String |} |}>, postTicketingFraudCheckEnabled: Boolean |}, ticketingData: {| emd: {| ticketingId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, totalCost: {| value: Number {"typeId": "double"}, currency: String |}, emdDocuments: Array<{| aeItemId: String, documentAssociation: Array<{| segmentId: String, ticketNumber: String, couponNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"} |}> |}> |}, ticket: Boolean |} |}, response: {| status: {| code: String, message: String |}, paymentResults: {| status: {| code: String, message: String |}, resultCode: String, posAction: String, sabreTransactionId: String, payments: Array<{| status: {| code: String |}, responseCode: String, fraudCheckResult: String, details: {| paymentId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, amount: {| value: Number {"typeId": "double"}, currency: String |} |}, approvalCode: String, remarks: Array<String>, fraudCheckRemarks: Array<String> |}>, allRemarksAddedToReservation: Boolean |}, ticketingResults: Array<{| ticketingId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, status: {| code: String, message: String |}, issuedDocumentNumbers: Array<String> |}> |} |} {"example": processed successfully\"},\"paymentResults\":{\"status\":{\"code\":\"SUCCESS\",\"message\":\"Successful Transaction\"},\"resultCode\":\"SUCCESS\",\"posAction\":\"PROCEED\",\"sabreTransactionId\":\"01311535009367377500\",\"payments\":[{\"status\":{\"code\":\"SUCCESS\"},\"responseCode\":\"APPROVED\",\"fraudCheckResult\":\"REJECT\",\"details\":{\"paymentId\":1,\"amount\":{\"value\":0.77,\"currency\":\"AUD\"}},\"approvalCode\":\"X82235\",\"remarks\":[\"AUTH-PSS\/AX5550\/23AUG\/01811535009367409119\",\" types:type.name: fullfillmentRQ

%dw 2.0

{"typeId": "int"}, amount: {| value: Number {"typeId": "double"}, currency: String |} |}, cardCode: String, cardNumber: String, expirationDate: String, cardSecurityCode: String, cardHolder: {| firstName: String, lastName: String |} |}>, postTicketingFraudCheckEnabled: Boolean |}, ticketingData: {| emd: {| ticketingId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, totalCost: {| value: Number {"typeId": "double"}, currency: String |}, emdDocuments: Array<{| aeItemId: String, documentAssociation: Array<{| segmentId: String, ticketNumber: String, couponNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"} |}> |}> |}, ticket: Boolean |} |} |} {"example": "{\"request\":{\"pos\":{\"aaa\":{\"country\":\"AU\",\"number\":\"99401013\"},\"company\":\"VA\",\"lniata\":\"BEC33E\",\"sine\":\"S19\",\"pseudoCityCode\":\"WIN\",\"channel\":\"ATO\",\"localDateTime\":\"2018-08-23T09:29:22\",\"source\":\"INTERACT\"},\"pnr\":\"QTWMUM\",\"orderDetails\":{\"passengerDetails\":[{\"nameNumber\":\"01.01\",\"type\":\"ADT\"},{\"nameNumber\":\"02.01\",\"type\":\"ADT\"}]},\"paymentData\":{\"payments\":[{\"@type\":\"CreditCard\",\"details\":{\"paymentId\":2,\"amount\":{\"value\":0.77,\"currency\":\"AUD\"}},\"cardCode\":\"VI,CA,AMEX\",\"cardNumber\":\"4005222222222223\",\"expirationDate\":\"2020-05\",\"cardSecurityCode\":\"123\",\"cardHolder\":{\"firstName\":\"Dariusz\",\"lastName\":\"Basista\"}}],\"postTicketingFraudCheckEnabled\":true},\"ticketingData\":{\"emd\":{\"ticketingId\":1,\"totalCost\":{\"value\":1.54,\"currency\":\"AUD\"},\"emdDocuments\":[{\"aeItemId\":\"61\",\"documentAssociation\":[{\"segmentId\":\"1\",\"ticketNumber\":\"7952145633308\",\"couponNumber\":1}]},{\"aeItemId\":\"63\",\"documentAssociation\":[{\"segmentId\":\"1\",\"ticketNumber\":\"7952145633309\",\"couponNumber\":1}]}]},\"ticket\":true}}}"}
